chunk:
MuLondon Lavender Foaming Cleanser (2020 formulation)

Brand: MuLondon

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: : Aqua (Water), Potassium sunflowerate (Sunflower Oil Soap)**, Potassium cocoate (Coconut Oil Soap)**, Glycerin (from vegetable soap)**, Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba Oil)*, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender Essential Oil)*, Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary Extract)*, Helianthus annuus (Sunflower Oil)*, Potassium citrate (Potassium

Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba Oil)*, Lavandula angustifolia (Lavender Essential Oil)*, Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary Extract)*, Helianthus annuus (Sunflower Oil)*, Potassium citrate (Potassium Salt), Citric acid

Directions: USAGE: Work the foam between hands, apply to wet skin, rinse well. Use sparingly. Avoid contact with eyes. Please patch test before use. Keep cool and away from sunlight.

FACE • HANDS • SHAVING

CONCENTRATED. NO PRESERVATIVES, ANIMAL INGREDIENTS OR ANIMAL TESTING.

FACE • HANDS • SHAVING

CONCENTRATED. NO PRESERVATIVES, ANIMAL INGREDIENTS OR ANIMAL TESTING.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
